name: 12 no Tsuki no Eve
summary: At the end of the year, even though everyone has different feelings, they all spend the last days of the year in a busy fashion. This spirit is also present in a new town Megumishi, close to the city. On Christmas Eve, an extremely ordinary boy, Naoto, met a strange girl. Even though she hadn’t met him before, she had a sense of déjà vu. This was when the story of Naoto and three girls begins. One wished to protect her happy time. One unconsciously tried to obtain something. One strove to achieve a precious goal.

name: 12 Months to Launch
summary: A lighthearted resource-management game of running an indie game studio! Play as a first-time indie game producer, making critical decisions for your team's future while balancing quality against viral appeal. Will you become a laughingstock among players, or a shining star in the industry?

name: 123 Slaughter Me Street 2
summary:
In this exciting prequel to the hit game "123 Slaughter Me Street", we find out the deep dark secrets that lead up to the madness of this series.

You find yourself confused with blood on your hands in a dark house with only a flashlight to guide you.

As clarity and cognizance begins to set in, the confusing haze you were feeling was almost a comfort compared to the harsh reality, that you... are not alone.
The air is putrid, and all you can feel are the eyes of the dead upon you. When there is nowhere to run, all you can do is hide. But what is safe?

When your inspiration comes from the other side, eventually you have to pay the piper.

In this deadly game of "Hide and Seek" you must stealthily fill your "Hide Meter" while evading your nemesis, and using your light for finding areas of refuge. Can you survive these 10 Deadly Levels of pure adrenaline rushing terror?

name: 12 Labours of Hercules VII: Fleecing the Fleece
summary: It's a new bromance from ancient Greece: when cunning Pelias orders the hero Jason to steal the Golden Fleece from the land of Colchis. Solve puzzles, find your way through numerous portals, and build and repair objects...

name: 12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature
summary: A time management/strategy game, in which you help Hercules (the ancient Greek mythical hero) and his team to progress through a set of levels to ultimate success. As a player, you direct the servants and heroes to remove obstacles, build structures and collect resources in order to fulfil the goal of each level and move on to the next level. The game has two modes: timed and relaxed. In timed mode, your goal is to beat the best time, which is a pretty hardcore experience. In relaxed mode, time is of no significance, and you just need to complete levels.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIV: Message in a Bottle - Collector's Edition
12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas - Collector's Edition
12 Labours of Hercules VIII: How I Met Megara - Collector's Edition
12 Labours of Hercules VII: Fleecing the Fleece - Collector's Edition
12-sai: Koi Suru Diary
summary: 12-sai: Koi Suru Diary is a visual novel for the Nintendo 3DS and is based off the manga 12-sai.

name: 1-2-Switch
summary: 1-2-Switch is a party game for everyone! Throw an impromptu party anywhere with anyone thanks to a new play style in which players look at each other—not the screen! Bring the action and fun into the real world as you face off in wild-west duels, cow-milking competitions, and more. While the action unfolds off-screen, the audience watches the players themselves instead of the screen.

name: 1213: Episode 1
summary:
1213: Episode 1 is the first iteration of Ben "Yahtzee" Croshaw's 1213 series. The game follows an amnesiac man only known by his subject number 1213. He is locked inside mysterious facility where his captor runs terrible experiments on him. Then, for reasons yet unknown, 1213 is freed from his cell, just to find out something has gone terribly wrong inside the facility. 
 
Unlike previous games by Ben Croshaw, 1213 is an action-adventure game featuring Prince of Persia style platforming and 2D shooter mechanics.

name: 1-2-3 or 4-5-6
summary:
1-2-3 or 4-5-6 ..... Spot the outlier. Among the many dice, there is one that stands out.
Find it within the time limit!
Answer correctly to level up. More dice will appear, and the challenge will deepen.
A simple yet profound test of intuition and observation.
Can you reach the highest level?

name: 1! 2! 3! Battle Card!
summary: A simple and interesting new poker game that supports 2-4 players online battles. The key to winning is to balance risks and benefits, perform operations to maximize benefits, participate in ranking and bidding competitions, and see who is the real "head-breaking" king!

name: 123 Wooden Figures
summary: one. Two. Three. We are all wooden people, no talking, no moving. "Then we pose and stop moving. Whoever can hold on until the end is the winner. Although I have never won,

name: 12 Labours of Hercules VI: Race for Olympus
summary: This time, Hercules and Megara are involved in the detective story. Alarm at Olympus is showing the absence of Zeus, who rarely left the peak. A few clues reveal the fact that Zeus has been abducted. Hercules and Megara begin the investigation.

name: 123 Dots
summary: The game includes more than 150 educational activities for your child to learn while having fun. 123 Dots also helps children develop important basic skills such as creativity, basic skills, attention span and memory. 123 Dots entertains toddlers while they learn numbers from 1 to 20 with its fun and friendly Dots. In addition to teaching numbers and counting, your children can learn geometric shapes, basic skills, the alphabet and sequences. All in one!

Immerse yourself in a grim post-apocalyptic world where survival depends on your skills, ingenuity, and determination. Explore abandoned streets, battle hordes of zombies, solve puzzles, and forge a path to the Central Hospital — your ultimate goal.

name: 123 Mazes
summary: Navigate 123 relaxing mazes in this 2D single-player puzzle game with customizable themes, calming music, and 100+ achievements

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVI: Olympic Bugs - Collector's Edition
12 Locks and Keys
summary: "12 Locks and Keys" is a game for the whole family, solve interesting puzzles and puzzles. You will need to solve various tasks to collect all the keys, an interesting challenge is already waiting for you!

name: 12 Hours to Die
summary: A mystery visual novel about six students forced to play a 12-hour long killing game.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVIII: Ghost Sheep
summary: Help Hercules restore balance in a flooded, haunted Hellas.

name: 1-2-Exquisite Word Search!
summary: 1-2-Exquisite Word Search is the fourth game in the 1-2-Word Search series. Building upon the previous entries this classic word search puzzle game returns with a brand new set of levels, themes, and music! Exquisite Word Search packs in all new hand crafted puzzles built on 3 different grid sizes. 7x7, 10x10, and 12x12 word search grids return. Choose your puzzle solving mood by changing the background theme set and switching up the music on the TreeFall Radio. Embark on a fun and relaxing journey solving word searches in 1-2-Exquisite Word Search! Fun new puzzles await the discerning eye.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules VI: Race for Olympus - Collectors Edition
12 Bullets to Midnight
summary: 12 Bullets to Midnight is a high-speed FPS roguelike where you skate, shoot, and tag your way through the Tower. As a captured bullet tagger, Skater must nail precise shots and high scores while evading Drones. Every bullet matters in this stylish battle for survival. Share scores on Discord!

name: 1-2-3 Bumblebee
summary:
1-2-3 Bumblebee is a computer game designed to help toddlers learn how to use the mouse.
The Bumblebee behaves just like a "grown up" mouse pointer: Moving the mouse makes the Bumblebee fly, and clicking on squares will make colorful shapes appear.

The feedback is reinforced by multi-tone sounds and voice recordings. Once your child progresses through all three "pages", they are rewarded with a little song.

The game runs in fullscreen mode and the keyboard is locked to prevent your child from accidentally leaving the program.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XI: Painted Adventure - Collector's Edition
123 Kids Fun Connect the Dots Games for Smart Kids
summary:
Join dots and see what is hidden under the mysteriously arranged digits! 123 Kids Fun Connect the Dots Games for Smart Kids - 60 pictures in 6 categories to choose for your toddler and preschooler!
123 Kids Fun Connect the Dots Games for Smart Kids is an incredibly charming connect-the-dots game which helps toddlers and children learn the names of dozen of objects, colors, insects and animals.
The gameplay is simple; connect the dots to reveal the hidden name and picture.

name: 123 Kids Fun Flashcards
summary:
123 Kids Fun Flashcards – early learning educational flashcard game for preschool kids and toddlers – This is the ultimate online flashcard tool for toddlers and preschoolers. With our flashcard game, kids learn first words with sounds, colors and pictures!

Flashcards with great sounds and animations in many categories: Furniture, Insects, Fruits, Vehicles, Cutlery and Dishes, Clothes, Vegetables, Animals, Bathroom + four 22-level quizzes and a scoreboard to help keep track of your child’s progress.

name: 12, Memory Lane
summary: Explore the mansion of Henry, the secretive grandfather of the Villemaine family, and uncover the mystery behind their sudden disappearance. Read Henry's memoir and bend reality in strange ways to make the decor reflect the stories. Can you piece back together what happened at 12, Memory Lane ?

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XII: Timeless Adventure - Collectors Edition
summary:
One sunny day brave Hercules was resting in his hammock and cooking delicious donuts. He dozed off just for a few minutes but it was enough for the hero's brunch to burn to a crisp. All the dreams of a starving Hercules were ruined. What should he do? There was a way. Hercules decided to turn back time, and move the clock's hand back with all his might. What could possibly go wrong? Obviously, everything!

The collector's edition contains additional bonus levels, a guide, and wallpapers.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules X: Greed for Speed - Collector's Edition
12 Hours Museum
summary: 12 Hours Museum” is a 3D exploration adventure game. The goal of the game is to find 45 anomalies in order to escape from the museum using a pocket watch. Once you find an anomaly, you can view and re-experience it. Collecting all endings and performing certain operations will open an extra mode.

name: 1, 2 Blame!
summary: 1, 2 Blame! is an online multiplayer game where Agents unmask the Killer. Find the clues, equip and use items to acquire additional abilities, debate who's the impostor and solve the mystery!

name: 12 is Better than 6
summary: 12 is Better Than 6 is a dynamic top-down hardcore shooter with stealth elements, presented in a Wild West theme. The action takes place in 1873, the noon of lawless and cruelty all over North America.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XV: Little Big Adventure
summary: Help Hercules free from the tiny folk's shackles and save Lilliputians' lands from a shadow-casting island floating in the sky!

name: 124 Handle of the World
summary:
Ever got that eerie feeling when you're in a bus, late at night? Ever thought about how much stronger that feeling must be when YOU'RE the driver? What may driving with the bus empty late at night feel like? This thought is what set me up to make this game.

In a PS1 style setting, you are a bus driver completing your night shift. You are getting tired, getting the last people off the bus to their destinations, until you're all alone. What might happen?

name: 1234 Connect Puzzle
summary: Blending the simple rule of sequentially tracing numbers with the trendy concept of 'physics puzzles' makes this game an irresistibly addictive experience!

name: 12 MiniBattles
summary:
This is a game for 2 players who will face each other in many battles locally and it is made up of 44 incredible mini-games. The gameplay is a button for each player (red and blue) and a general counter to know who is the true champion.

The game is developed in the style of retro 8-bit games, with a pixelated touch to create an atmosphere like in those times and very realistic physics for unlimited fun.

name: 12 Floors to Burnout
summary: 2D action roguelike in pixel art with melee combat. Face metaphorical enemies, destroy environments, and ascend 12 procedurally generated floors. Core mechanics: melee combat, environmental destruction, procedural generation, and multiple endings.

name: 12 Tails Online
summary:
'12 Tails Online' is a Thai instance-based MMORPG by BigBug Studio.

'12 Tails Online' are named for the 12 animal species that make up the playable classes; Bat, Bison, Cat, Chameleon, Mole, Monkey, Panda, Penguin, Rabbit, Sheep, Whale, and Wolf.

name: 12 Hours Before Christmas
summary: Welcome to the 12h Till Xmas! This is a very simple pixel art game where you control penguins to make Christmas presents as much as you can. Achieve your best result and share it.It is our First Game so feedback is welcomed =).

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVIII: Ghost Sheep - Collector's Edition
summary: Help Hercules battle mischievous ghosts, restore balance to Hellas, and unravel ancient mysteries. Collector's Edition includes an interactive guide, wallpapers, bonus levels and even more sheep.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIX: Pandora’s Gift Box
summary: Help Hercules stop Pandora’s icy curse in snowy, festive Hellas!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules X: Greed for Speed
summary: Help Hercules find a way to catch a creature that moves faster than wind, and destroys everything in its path!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature - Collector's Edition
12 Labours of Hercules IX: A Hero's Moonwalk - Collector's Edition
12 Labours of Hercules XIII: Wonder-ful Builder - Collector's Edition
120 Yen Stories
summary: In 120 Yen series, each season has a unique heroine. By using the four seasons of Japan to tell the story of two people meeting and getting along through the keyword "120 yen".

name: 1/2 Summer
summary:
During the summer vacation, Kaname was asked to help out at his family's inn in Tohoku. He had expected it to be a refreshing change from the sweltering heat in Tokyo, but when he arrived at the train station with his younger sister Kazuha, he was surprised to find that the town he once lived in, now have a huge school built in it. Boarding a crowded bus and traveling out of the city to Kusanagi Inn, he was relieved to see the familiar country scenery once again. But why are there schoolgirls in the inn?

The owner told him that they were students from Jinza Gakuen in the city, but due to an incident they couldn’t stay in their dormitory, so she let them stay at the inn for the summer. That’s why he was needed there: there was a need for more staff to look after the girls. Furthermore, he had one more thing on his mind. The mischievous Zashiki-warashi that lived in the inn, because of whom he ends up returning to the countryside for good.

name: 12 Party Games Collection
summary: 12 games. Endless fun. One ultimate party pack!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules VIII: How I Met Megara
summary: This is a strategic Time Management game that follows young Hercules as he tries to earn Megara's love!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas
summary: With your help, Hercules must return the kids home, blow up the factory that produces the evil toys, and lead a strategic operation to destroy Ares' command transmitter in 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XI: Painted Adventure
summary: 12 Labours of Hercules XI: Painted Adventure is a casual puzzle, adventure game in which the young girl Emma finds herself in ancient Greece. Follow Emma as she helps Hercules on all of his adventures!

name: 12 Hours
summary: You’re trapped in an infinite, repeating corridor. If you encounter an anomaly, turn back immediately. Make the right decisions, and time will advance. True exits will appear at 12:00. Remember, you are alone.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules II: The Cretan Bull
summary: Accompany Hercules in his quest for the Cretan Bull!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules III: Girl Power
summary: Help Megara free the hero and then accompany him in all of his adventures, including the forest of the Amazons and Mount Olympus in 12 Labours of Hercules III: Girl Power!

name: 12nin no Onna Kyoushi
summary: Main character transfers to an elite boys' school where his uncle becomes a president. They decide to use women teachers as a bait to attract the best students. For that protagonist develops a plan to train teachers into slaves.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVII: Feathered Fury
summary: Help Hercules stop a comet from destroying Earth! Explore Aztec temples, solve puzzles, and meet the legendary Quetzalcoatl!

name: 123 Animal Math Games For Kids
summary: The first entry in the 123 Animal Math series.

name: 1/2 Red Riding Hood
summary: There is this girl known as the Red Riding Hood. She has the strength of ten men. This is a completely different story about the familiar fairy-tale character Red Riding Hood. A much darker and twisted version

name: 12 Rounds Against Satan
summary: The city is captured by Demon Tricks /12 RAGS Team must save the people.

name: 12 Vengeful Ghosts
summary:
12 Vengeful Ghosts is Touhou Project meets 12 Angry Men.

This game is a narrative bullet hell very loosely inspired by the aforementioned film. You play as one of twelve ghosts responsible for deciding the fate of a mortal, but those other ghosts aren't nearly as forgiving as you.

name: 1, 2, 3... Bruegel!
summary: 1, 2, 3... Bruegel! is a playful VR experience into Pieter Bruegel the Elder's painting “Children’s Games”.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XV
summary:
Hercules was peacefully napping aboard a ship when a gentle breeze turned out to be a storm. The hero’s boat tossed to unknown shores and ripped to shreds. While Hercules was unconscious, a tiny folk gathered around him and… decided to tie the demigod up!
The Lilliputians mistook Hercules for an enemy from a mysterious floating island name Laput which shadows their lands from sun and rain. Then the hero promises to solve the mystery of the island in the sky and save his tiny new friends. But will the Lilliputian king believe a huge foreigner enough to untie him? Anyway Hercules’s going to fight for his freedom and justice!
Together with Hercules you will take a trip through little and big lands, build bizarre devices, fly to the clouds, defeat sky pirates, and face various unexpected situations. Join this fascinating dimensionless journey right now!

name: 1213: Episode 2
summary: 1213: Episode 2 is the second game in Ben "Yahtzee" Croshaw's sci-fi adventure series, 1213.

name: 123 Kids Fun Puzzle Green
summary: This jigsaw puzzle game helps your kids develop matching, tactile and fine motor skills while playing almost 90 different jigsaw puzzles. 123 Kids Fun Puzzle Green Jigsaw Puzzle Game provides hours of entertainment for you and your whole family.

name: 12 Labors
summary: A short game about working your way up to an apology.

name: 128 Linedefs, 64 Things
summary:
A Vanilla Community Project with one rule: Each map could at most only have 128 Linedefs and 64 Things.

The megawad comes with 32 maps (+ 3 bonus) from the Doomworld Community, both old and new!

All maps were designed with pistol start in mind, though continuous play is perfectly fine.

name: 123Babycount
summary: Your baby will begin learning to count so easily with this beautifully simple game. Bold and colourful illustrations will hold your little one's attention while they count along from one to ten. Abacus numbers slide in along the top as baby lights up the images one by one. You'll be surprised just how quickly you baby will engage with this game and begin to learn to count!

12 Family Games (also known as 12 and 12 Games) is a collection of 12 mini-games targeted for families, released for the Nintendo DS, on 2008, and published by infamous, now defunct company Phoenix Games.

name: 12 pm Break
summary: 12 pm Break drops players into a chaotic lunch-hour showdown known as “Toonie Tuesday.” You’re not just taking a break—you’re fighting through it. With fast-paced action across multiple maps, players battle through office-themed arenas, cafeteria shootouts, and surreal corporate environments. The game blends satire and stylized violence with a tongue-in-cheek tone.

name: 125 Monkey Games
summary: 125 monkey games for your monkey enjoyment. Gather speed on the Monkey Ramp then press Space to open the Monkey Wings in the air. Monkey Glide to catch bananas and land on a high scoring target!

name: 123 Talk
summary:
The object of 123-Talk is to talk to your child, to help teach them how to say numbers, counting, addition, subtraction, and interact with a computer. For children ages 1-4, 123-Talk will teach your child to say the the numbers 1 through 10 and how to find numbers on the keyboard. They will also learn how to sing the 123 song and how to draw with Easy Draw II.

The registered version of this game lets you play with the latest version and also include new features.

name: 12 Bananas
summary: Leap over treacherous chasms, navigate past a sea of hazards, and locate all 12 bananas as you embark on an epic quest and travel the patience-testing path that lies ahead in this infuriatingly challenging, unforgiving, puzzling, memey platformer.

name: 12-Sai: Torokeru Puzzle Futari no Harmony
summary: 12-Sai. Torokeru Puzzle Futari no Harmony is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Happinet, which was released in Japan in 2017.

name: 1213: Special Edition
summary:
1213 is a series of sci-fi adventure games by Ben "Yahzee" Croshaw. The games follow an amnesiac man only known by his subject number 1213. He is locked inside mysterious facility where his captor runs terrible experiments on him. Then, for reasons yet unknown, 1213 is freed from his cell, just to find out something has gone terribly wrong inside the facility. 
 
Unlike previous games by Ben Croshaw, 1213 is an action-adventure game featuring Prince of Persia style platforming and 2D shooter mechanics.

name: 123 Slaughter Me Street
summary: Welcome everyone to 123 Slaughter Me Street! A criminal on the run, you find yourself evading police as you make your escape down an alley. You see an old fire escape and scramble up to the roof of an abandoned building; you are safe here. As the patrol cars drive past, you slip into the shadows.

name: 1... 2... 3... Kick It!: Drop That Beat Like an Ugly Baby
summary: You've taken to building giant, kilometers-long aerial sculptures inspired by your own music, and are now BASE jumping from them for sport. These jumps are all about style and timing. Buzz those girders, groove along that building, and finish with a twist for extra points, all the while listening to your own soundtrack.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIII: Wonder-ful Builder
summary: Help Hercules build Colossus of Rhodes, Lighthouse of Alexandria and other Wonders of the World despite all the obstacles!

name: 12 Dino Games in 1
summary: An unlicensed Genesis cartridge from AtGames.

name: 125 Balls
summary: "125 Balls" is a 3D arcade and puzzle game. It is mini, beautiful and addictive. Easy to learn: shoot balls to the planet while don't hit other balls. Hard to master: it is from developer of "99.99%" and it is only for torturing yourself! Can you challenge 125 balls?

name: 12Gems
summary:
The aerial castle "Ganseld" floating in the sky. The 12 gems that support it splashed on the ground as protruding ...! If you don't collect all the gems by morning, you will fall to the ground where Ganseld is prepared. Tino, a boy living in Ganseld, landed on the ground under the order of the recovery of Shem. The mission given to Tino is... "To collect 12 GEMs scattered on the field by dawn."
In order to get GEMs, you have to clear a number of difficulties!!

Dino, who was called by the three major lawmakers and was suddenly ordered to recover the GEM, decided to descend to the unclean earthly world ...There, he met Randita, a girl from "Scavengers."

An adventure that unfolds on a variety of fields such as the seabed and snow. Dino has to overcome various trials...! A powerful battle scene where flashy magic flies around!
You can also enjoy it tactically, such as summoning "GEM Hermit" sealed in GEM and performing special attacks.

name: 1/2 Halfway
summary: In a world dominated by black and white, two elements are seeking a path to reunite and restore the harmony.
the world's first digital elimination play!

name: 12 is Better than 6: The Apostles
summary:
The DLC on the main story of "12 is Better than 6" is right around the corner!
Meet 3 new characters with their own story campaigns and different gameplay: Bill Watt, Indian Warrior and Slippery Pitt.

name: 12-Sai: Honto no Kimochi
summary: A Happinet developed Nintendo 3DS romance adventure game based off the manga and anime Age 12

name: 1-2-Swift
summary: 1-2-Swift: It’s high noon is a party game for 2 players but using only 1 set of HTC Vive or just keyboard. Duel your friend as a cowboy and shoot the bullet as soon as High Noon come!

name: 123 Animal First Grade Math
summary: An educational maths game for OUYA.

name: 12 Locks: Plasticine Room
summary: 12 Locks: Plasticine Room is an online puzzle game that challenges players to use their puzzle-solving skills to unlock 12 different locks to complete the game. The game is set in a plasticine room, where players must navigate their way through the challenges to unlock each lock. The puzzles require players to think creatively and logically, using their problem-solving skills to overcome each obstacle in their path. With each lock unlocked, players gain a sense of satisfaction and progress toward completing the game.

name: 123 Animal Preschool Games for Kids
summary: Make sure your preschooler is caught up with his or her mathematical knowledge with this OUYA exclusive title.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIV: Message in a Bottle
summary: Help Hercules uncover the mystery of strange messages in bottles and save Olympian gods!

name: 12 Hours
summary: The protagonist was in a very nightmarish and realistic lucid dream, he needed to find a way to wake up, avoiding the creepy creature that was chasing him. Find a way to wake up, each time the level is generated randomly.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVI: Olympic Bugs
summary: Help Hercules stop Olympian-created sentient machines’ rebellion, uncover the cause, and protect humanity from imminent danger!

name: 123 Kids Fun Alphabet
summary: 123 Kids Fun ALPHABET is fun and interactive way for your children to learn and practice saying, identifying and writing the letters of the alphabet.

name: 12 O'Clock High: Bombing the Reich
summary: 12 O'Clock High: Bombing the Reich is a flight sim set in World War II.

name: 123 Animal Second Grade Math for Kids
summary: The fourth game in the 123 Animal Math series.

name: 12am
summary: A non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame made by an anonymous developer. The main protagonist is Limbo.

name: 123 Kids Fun Puzzle Gold
summary: 123 Fun Kids PUZZLE GOLD is a collection of puzzles which help children identify a dizzying amount of animals and objects.

name: 12-ji no Kane to Cinderella Cinderella Series Triple All Series Pack
123 Kids Fun Puzzle Blue
summary:
Our puzzle for kids game features activities that foster kids creativity and motor skills. 123 Kids Fun Puzzle – puzzle game for toddlers and preschoolers – was extensively tested with kids to ensure its design is as simple as possible and kids can explore the game independently. We hope your kids will love it!

Each slider puzzle has 3 different levels of difficulty – 6, 9, or 12 pieces.

name: 12 Hours 2
summary: You got into an unusual dream. The goal of the game is to wake up, going through difficulties, avoiding the vigilant guard of the museum. The artificial intelligence of the enemy is very developed. How far will you go to unravel the secrets of Douglas? What does he hide from prying eyes?

name: 12 Orbits
summary: 12 Orbits is a colorful, friendly, fun, and sometimes a little chaotic game. The rules are simple and there's just one button per player! A new game can always be set up within seconds and the rounds only last for about five minutes!

name: 1213: Episode 3
summary: 1213: Episode 3 is the third game in Ben "Yahtzee" Croshaw's sci-fi adventure series, 1213.

name: 1-2-Whopping Word Search!
summary: 1-2-Whopping Word Search is sequel to "1-2-Word Search!" packed with all new features! This game now utilizes multiple grid sizes for both large and small puzzles. Each level now has a hidden word to find that will unlock new music, and there are more than 10 new background themes that completely change the look and feel of the game. 1-2-Whopping Word Search! is classic word search puzzle game with a TreeFall twist! Embark on a fun and relaxing journey solving word searches while listening to the TreeFall Radio!

name: 1-2-Word Search!
summary:
1-2-Word Search is a classic word search puzzle game with a TreeFall twist! As you complete and solve each word search puzzle you unlock new background music to change up the mood of each puzzle.

Embark on a fun and relaxing time solving word searches while listening to the TreeFall Radio!

name: 123 Kids Fun Puzzle Red
summary: 123 KIDS FUN PUZZLE RED is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination.

name: 12 Gatsu Monogatari: December Story
summary: A December story with a girl you care about in a town colored in Christmas colors. Who will you spend Christmas with...?

name: 12Riven: The Psi-Climinal of Integral
summary: 12Riven is a visual novel in which the player makes progress by reading the game's story. At certain points during conversations with other characters, the player is given a set of choices. Depending on what the player chooses, the story diverges into different branches, eventually leading to different endings; there is only one "true ending"

name: 123 Kids Fun Education
summary:
Learning Games – 123 Kids Fun Education including counting, colors, geometry, alphabet, math, numbers, shapes sorting, patterns, puzzles, learn to read letters.

123 Kids Fun Education is a collection of 15 entertaining educational games for your preschoolers! These games help millions of parents who homeschool their children and teachers in pre-kindergarten. Preschool Learning Games help children learn in a fun way.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules IX: A Hero's Moonwalk
summary: An astronomical threat in space! Get on board the spaceship with Hercules: explore distant planets, find extraterrestrial life and save the galaxy from the dangerous monster!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XII: Timeless Adventure
summary: Help Hercules repair the clock he broke trying to turn back time, defeat Chronos and save the world from catastrophe!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules
summary: Accompany Hercules on a quest to rescue his wife, kidnapped by the evil Hades in 12 Labours of Hercules! You'll meet heroes from Ancient Greece as you vanquish beasts, repair roads and construct wonders in this stunning Time Management game!
